com.dustinroepsch.SoftwareRenderer.Engine

Class TransformationMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dustinroepsch.SoftwareRenderer.Engine.TransformationMatrix

  • public class TransformationMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Transformation Matrix as described in http://www.codinglabs.net/article_world_view_projection_matrix.aspx

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransformationMatrix()
      Creates the identity transformation matrix (no rotation, no translation);

    • Method Detail

      • applyTo

        public Vector3 applyTo(Vector3 vector3)
        Multiplies this transformation matrix by a vector and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        vector3 - the vector to transform.
        Returns:
        the result of the transformation.

      • applyTo

        public TransformationMatrix applyTo(TransformationMatrix other)
        Applies this transformation matrix to another transformation matrix and returns the result. Uses the iterative method found at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_multiplication_algorithm
        Parameters:
        other - The matrix to apply this matrix to.
        Returns:
        The transformed matrix.

      • randomize

        public void randomize()
        Fills the matrix with random values. Preserves the bottom right 1, and the bottom row zeros.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Overrides:

      • getXrotation

        public static TransformationMatrix getXrotation(float theta)
        Returns a transformation that will rotate around the x axis.
        Parameters:
        theta - the angle to rotate in radians.
        Returns:
        The transformation representation of the rotation.
